name: Rafi's Kitchen - Recipe Sharing Platform
description: A recipe-sharing platform with user authentication, interactive UI, and secure data management.
details: This project focused on creating a seamless experience for sharing and browsing recipes. Challenges included integrating Firebase for user authentication and database management. Future plans involve adding a meal planner and personalized recipe suggestions.

name: Athlete Zone - Fitness Tracking App
description: A fitness tracking app that helps users track their workouts and progress in a structured way.
details: Developed a fitness tracker with features for logging workouts and tracking goals. Challenges included implementing efficient data handling with MongoDB. Future updates will include data visualization for progress and push notifications for reminders.

name: Gadget Heaven - E-Commerce Website
description: A sleek and responsive e-commerce website for browsing and purchasing gadgets.
details: Designed and implemented an intuitive interface for gadget browsing and purchasing. Challenges included managing responsive layouts and integrating Firebase. Plans include adding customer reviews and product comparison features.

name: Online Tutor Booking Platform
description: A platform for booking tutors online with personalized options for students.
details: Built a platform to connect students with tutors efficiently. Faced challenges with scheduling and booking logic. Future improvements include integrating video conferencing and a rating system for tutors.
